scripts.test.saucelabs: env SAUCE_BUILD='Sauce Labs Build' SAUCE_SCREEN_RESOLUTION='1920x1080' SAUCE_API_HOST=eu-central-1.saucelabs.com testcafe 'saucelabs:Chrome@latest:Windows 10' tests/specs/checkout.complete.spec.js
scripts.test.saucelabs.us: env SAUCE_BUILD="Sauce Labs Build - $(date)" SAUCE_SCREEN_RESOLUTION='1920x1080' node tests/configs/saucelabs.config.js
scripts.test.saucelabs.eu: env SAUCE_BUILD="Sauce Labs Build - $(date)" SAUCE_SCREEN_RESOLUTION='1920x1080' SAUCE_API_HOST=eu-central-1.saucelabs.com node tests/configs/saucelabs.config.js
